summary: Website update: Restore/add Sample 1–12 items under Home → Explore Our Work for multiple categories, with admin-only ability for the owner to upload/update photos; do not change Home → Our Premium Service section.
architectural_notes: Only the admin (site owner) can upload/update Explore Our Work sample images; customers must not have access.
known_issues: Explore Our Work samples for Business Card (and other specified categories) are missing and need Sample 1–12 restored/added.

existing_features.title: Update the frontend product pages for Business Card, Brand Logo Design, Product Banner Design, and Photo Frame Design to display an “Explore Our Work” samples gallery showing 12 slots (Sample 1–12) for that product category. Empty slots must still render as visible placeholders so the gallery never looks “missing”.

Add an admin-only frontend interface to upload/replace Explore Our Work sample images for each category (Business Card, Logo Design, Product Banner, Photo Frame), for all 12 slots. Ensure this admin UI is not accessible to non-admin users (hide UI and block actions).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add/restore Sample 1–12 entries under Home → Explore Our Work → Business Card, Logo Design, Product Banner, and Photo Frame categories
Admin-only access so only the site owner can upload/update the Explore Our Work sample photos (customers cannot)
Ensure Home → Our Premium Service section remains unchanged (no sample additions or edits)

Add backend support for storing and serving 12 sample images (Sample 1–12) for each “Explore Our Work” category: Business Card, Logo Design, Product Banner, and Photo Frame. Provide public read APIs to fetch samples per category, and admin-only write APIs to upload/replace/remove samples by slot position (1–12).
Ensure the Home page “Our Premium Services” section remains unchanged (no content edits and no samples added there) while implementing the Explore Our Work sample restoration.

If backend state schema changes are required to expand existing Product Banner samples (currently 4 slots) to 12 slots and to add other categories, add a conditional Motoko migration that preserves any already-stored Product Banner sample images (e.g., existing Sample 1–4 data) during upgrade.

projectName: Restore “Explore Our Work” Sample 1–12 galleries for Business Card, Logo Design, Product Banner, and Photo Frame with admin-only uploads
